revised_title: A Detailed Account of the St. Michael's Volcano Eruption
tldr: The author provides a detailed account of the eruption of a volcano off the coast of St. Michael's Island. He describes the columns of smoke, ash, and cinders, as well as the vivid flashes of lightning and beautiful cloud formations. The author also discusses the formation of the island and the effects of the eruption on the surrounding area, including earthquakes and the boiling water in the crater.
